page.html:
Hi, I am Tuesday!

In 2012, I had the privilege to work with the best art practitioners in the country for the London 2012 Festival – the largest UK-wide festival ever staged. As the digital manager for the culture team, we were able to deliver more than 12,000 events attended by more than 20 million people around the UK in celebration of the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

More on the digital me et.al

I am an all-around digital professional with many years of experience in content creation, content strategy and social media. You can also find out more about me in my CV, work page or my LinkedIn profile.

Disclaimer

All views expressed are my own and not those of the companies I work for.
